meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Melissa Nilles Erik Lang Steve Gratz Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6058.

td.p: Melissa Nilles, a legislative aide from Kapolei, Hawaii
Erik Lang, a mail room clerk from Nashville, Tennessee
Steve Gratz, a freelance artist from Washington, D.C. (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,399)

tr.td: (Alex: You name the empire or the country for us.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Steve Buscemi whoops it up during Prohibition in this 2010 drama')

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 15):
Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: (Alex: ...and those letters in quotation marks, so they will come up in that order in each correct response.)
(Jimmy: From the Domino sugar refinery in Louisiana--what it has to go through before it can sweeten your tea.)

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: The correct response is [*]--the Indus River.)
ErikWhat is Democratic Republic of Congo
$2,800
MelissaWhat is China?
$2,000
SteveWhat is Brazil
$5,700
India')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'By area, it\'s the world\'s largest country that\'s named for a river')

tr.td: By area, it's the world's largest country that's named for a river

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
